page.title: 08INDUSTRY IN HEMEL HEMPSTEAD
page.content: The{Maylands Avenue Industrial {Estate}employs more than 11,000 people. There are many large companies including Kodak, Microdata, Lucas, Atlas Copco, Data Efficiency, BSI, Honeywell and Northern Telecom. The last few years have seen an increase in{"high-tech" electrical}and {electronic industries,}but a decline in traditional{mechanical}and {manufacturing firms.}Maylands Avenue is attracting new companies to Hemel Hempstead, particularly due to the close proximity of the{M25}and the{M1, which provide good access to many other parts of the country. {Unemployment}in the area is about 8.5%, compared to 9.5% for the South-East and 13% for the UK as a whole.
